      • exchange

        public final <R> HttpResponse<R> exchange​(HttpRequest<R> httpRequest)
        Starting exchange data from Http Client
        Type Parameters:
        R - Response Type Class
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the {@code HttpRequest} filled to requesting subject
        Returns:
        Non throwing response if any subjects are be fulfilled. If it throws exceptions will be return null
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - will throwing {@code RuntimeException} if {@code ExceptionHandler} is not defined to handling error messages

        Synchronized Exchange
        Type Parameters:
        R - Response Type Class
        Parameters:
        request - the {@code HttpRequest} filled to requesting subject
        response - Consuming HttpResponse if any exist
        exceptions - Consuming any exceptions if any exist
